text: Valeria Golino (born 22 October 1965) is an Italian director and actress. She played Susanna in Rain Man. She played Ramada in Hot Shots!. Golino was born in Naples, Italy. She was raised in Sorrento and Athens. ==References== Category:Actors from Campania Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Actors from Athens Category:Actors from Naples Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Movie people from Naples
title: Valeria Golino
